description: It started with a comedy awards show and a bombshell revelation that left the audience stunned.
title: Denmark confronts sexual harassment at work in #MeToo moment
title_page: Denmark confronts sexual harassment at work in #MeToo moment - BBC News
maintext: "We've all experienced it to a greater or lesser degree over the course of our careers: inappropriate remarks on our appearance or clothing; suggestive messages; physical behaviour that crosses the line. Warnings that there are a few men we should avoid at the Christmas party. It happened before. It's still happening."
